text: Ate kaho ki iha saca hai tuhade raba valom, isa la'i jihara bada cahe isa nu mane ate jihara na cahe uha nam mane. Asim zalimam la'i ajihi aga ti'ara kiti hai. Jinham di'am lapatam unham nu apane ghere vica lai lainagi'am. Ate jekara uha pani di maga karanage tam unham di iha maga ajihe pani nala puri kiti javegi jisa di parata tela de samana hovegi. Uha cihari'am nu bhuna devega. Kihom jiha bura pani hovega ate kiho jiha bura tikana
